text: Agree! We are using it to create course tracks and we miss the ability to format headings and insert images.

Hello
<@UH8USUDNF> here!
I want to help everyone's HubSpot project!

Hi guys!
Is there a way to translate a hubDB table?

Does anybody know if the Rich Text field in HubDB will support heading tags ever (or allow you to view markup at least)? I know this seems small in the scheme of things but I have a large prospect who is considering the lack of formatting options within that field type a deal breaker in moving to the HubSpot CMSâ€¦
I have this same question. Let me know if you find an answer please!
<@U24GZQ3GF> I found this: <https://integrate.HubSpot.com/t/hubdb-translation/15297> they said there is no way to create a translation of a HubDB table :white_frowning_face:
